contents:
膜改了著名书单说唱艺术家维尔·习密斯《膜衣人》MO in Black系列的主题曲，黑忙内地看得懂： 

Gang of Chinese Dictators (GCD)

Here come the Gang of Chinese Dictators
(It's the GCD, uh, here come the GCD's)
Here come the GCD‘s
They won't let you remember
Nah nah nah
The bad guys dress in black, remember that
Just in case we ever face to face and make contact
The title held by them: GCD
Means what you think you saw, you did not see
So don't blink be what was there is now gone
Black suit with the black Ray-Bans on
Walk in shadow, move in silence
Oppressors of civil disobedience 
You dare to speak against them, 
you'll be on the government list
You straight don't exist, 
no names and no fingerprints 
(puff - gone to the lunatic asylum like Miss Dong Qiongyao)

Saw somethin' incriminating the CCP, watch your back
'Cause you never quite know where the GCD's is at
Uh and
Here come the Gang of Chinese Dictators (GCD)
Autocratic Regime Defenders
(ooh, ooh, ooh)
Here come the Gang of the Chinese Dictators (GCD)
